Mechanized Field SND
0 Land 0 Mechanized Field enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add W. 1W: Until end of turn, Mechanized Field becomes a 2/1 white Viking creature with “Whenever Mechanized Field crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains lifelink until end of turn.” It’s still a land.
Shipwrights' Guild SND
0 Land 0 Shipwrights’ Guild enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add U. 1U: Until end of turn, Shipwrights’ Guild becomes a 2/1 blue Viking creature with “Whenever Shipwrights’ Guild crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains flying until end of turn.” It’s still a land.
Floating Market SND
0 Land 0 Floating Market enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add B. 1B: Until end of turn, Floating Market becomes a 2/1 black Viking creature with “Whenever Floating Market crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains menace until end of turn.” It’s still a land.
Stone Harbor SND
0 Land 0 Stone Harbor enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add R. 1R: Until end of turn, Stone Harbor becomes a 2/1 red Viking creature with “Whenever Stone Harbor crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains first strike until end of turn.” It’s still a land.
Fishing Hamlet SND
0 Land 0 Fishing Hamlet enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add G. 1G: Until end of turn, Fishing Hamlet becomes a 2/1 green Viking creature with “Whenever Fishing Hamlet crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains trample until end of turn.” It’s still a land.
Shimmerdrift Vale SND
0 Snow Land 0 Shimmerdrift Vale enters the battlefield tapped. As Shimmerdrift Vale enters the battlefield, choose a color. T: Add one mana of the chosen color.
Inga, Musing Mariner SND WU 1WU 3 Legendary Creature - Human Shaman Scout 1/1 2 When Inga, Musing Mariner enters the battlefield, surveil 2. Once during each turn, whenever a Vehicle you control becomes crewed, you may draw a card.
Grimmast, Jarl of Helstrond SND UB 1UB 3 Legendary Creature - Zombie Viking Noble 2/2 2 Menace 3UB, T: Return target creature or Vehicle card of mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield where X is the total power among creatures you control. Activate only if a creature died under your control this turn.
Lifaeld, Daughter of Tusk SND BR 1BR 3 Legendary Creature - Human Elf Viking 1/3 2 Double strike At the beginning of combat on each turn, Lifaeld, Daughter of Tusk gets +X/+X where X is the number of creature cards that left your graveyard this turn.

Hvetja, Harbinger of the Hunt SND RG
3 Legendary Snow Creature - Werewolf Berserker 4/4 2 Trample, haste 2SS: Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it’s a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. S can be paid with one mana from a snow source.) --- (Front): Hvetja, Expeditions Expert
Mikill, the Beskir Bull SND WG 1WG 3 Legendary Creature - Human Giant Viking 0/1+* 2 Mikill, the Beskir Bull’s toughness is equal to 1 plus the number of Goats, Sheep, Oxen, and/or Aurochs you control. Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and crews Vehicles using its toughness rather than its power.
Hirthilf, Skygge Daydream SND WB 1WB 3 Legendary Snow Creature - Shade 1/2 2 Shadow Whenever one or more snow creatures or creatures with shadow you control deal combat damage to your opponents, you may pay S for each of those opponents. For each S paid, prevent all combat damage target creature they control would deal until your next turn.
Harald, Venom King SND BG 1BG 3 Legendary Creature - Elf Viking Noble 2/2 2 Infect Whenever you lose life for the first time on your turn, Harald, Venom King deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Margvet, Winter's Familiar SND UG 1UG 3 Legendary Snow Creature - Ferret Hydra 2/2 2 XSSS: Monstrosity X. Whenever you activate an ability of a snow creature, tap target creature you don’t control and put a number of stun counters on it equal to the amount of S you paid as part of that ability’s activation cost.
Raudhond, Master of Raids SND UR 1UR 3 Legendary Creature - Human Viking 3/3 2 Haste Pirates and Warriors you control are Vikings in addition to their other types. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Vikings you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Syngja, Skald of Armories SND WR 1WR 3 Legendary Creature - Dwarf Viking Cleric 2/3 2 Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, for each kind of counter on that creature and/or Equipment attached to it, you may put another counter of that kind on that permanent or remove one from it.
Goat-Drawn Chariot SND W 1W 2 Artifact - Equipment 1 When Goat-Drawn Chariot enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token, then attach Goat-Drawn Chariot to it. Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Mantle of Tides SND U U 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, attach Mantle of Tides to target creature you control. Equip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Beinstal Axe SND B 1B 2 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature has “Whenever another creature you controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.” Equip 2 (2: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Tormentor's Helm SND R R 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to defending player. Equip 1 (1: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Lantern Flail SND G 1G 2 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has illuminate. (That creature can block creatures with shadow.) Equip 3 (3: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Stalwart Longship SND W 1W 2 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Vigilance (Attacking doesn’t cause this creature to tap.) Whenever Stalwart Longship attacks, untap another target creature you control. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Scalewing Leviathan SND U 5UU 7 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Hexproof (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever Wardscale Leviathan becomes crewed for the first time each turn, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.) Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Karfell Dreadnought SND B 3BB 5 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.) When Karfell Dreadnought enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie Berserker creature tokens with decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Blitz Drake SND R 1R 2 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Haste (This creature can attack and T as soon as it comes under your control.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Battering Ship SND G 2G 3 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.) Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Rune of Warding SND W 1W 2 Enchantment - Aura Rune 1 Enchant permanent As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has ward 2. As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has ward 2.”
Rune of The Raven SND U 2UU 4 Enchantment - Aura Rune 1 Enchant permanent When Rune of the Raven enters the battlefield, draw two cards. As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it has flying. As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature has flying.”
Rune of Shadows SND B S/B 1 Snow Enchantment - Aura Rune 1 (S/B can be paid with B from a snow source.) Enchant permanent As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets -1/-0 and has shadow. As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature gets -1/-0 and has shadow.”
Rune of Dragonfire SND R 1R 2 Enchantment - Aura Rune 1 Enchant permanent As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it has haste and “R: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.” As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature has haste” and “R: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”
Rune of Grounding Light SND G 1G 2 Enchantment - Aura Rune 1 Enchant permanent As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has reach and illuminate. As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has reach and illuminate.”
Obscured by Snow SND W S/W 1 Snow Instant 3 (S/W can be paid with W from a snow source.) Target creature you control gains shadow and protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (That creature can only block creatures with shadow, and can’t be blocked except by creatures with shadow or illuminate. It can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
Voyager's Charm SND U 2U 3 Instant 3 Choose one — • Target Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. • Tap or untap target artifact or creature. • Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
